# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/exclude ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/exclude ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rc_ladder_lib.inc ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rc_ladder_lib.inc ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rc_simple.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rc_simple.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rc_simple_mor.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rc_simple_mor.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rcd_ladder_lib.inc ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rcd_ladder_lib.inc ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/AUTODETECT/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh COMMAND bash rc_simple_mor.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} rc_simple_mor.cir ${OutputDataDir}/ROM/AUTODETECT/rc_simple_mor.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/AUTODETECT/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;rom;diode;resistor;capacitor;inductor")
